argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( lub ` K ) = ( lub ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( glb ` K ) = ( glb ` K ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_isclat | |- ( K e. CLat <-> ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom ( lub ` K ) = ~P ( Base ` K ) /\ dom ( glb ` K ) = ~P ( Base ` K ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simplbi | |- ( K e. CLat -> K e. Poset ) |
